author: PlayStation
description:

title: Here's your week in PlayStation. Read more over at PlayStation Blog 📰

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/infinity-nikki

Infinity Nikki version 1.4 [Revelry Season] will be available after the update on March 25 (UTC-7)! 

When the [Revelry Season] arrives and the floating isle rises from the lake, the Faewish Sprites gather around to host a masquerade party.  
Obtain the limited 5-star outfit, [Crimson Rhapsody], transform into a doll, and join the celebration! Let the festivities begin!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Infinity Nikki - Version 1.4 [Revelry Season] Preview | PS5 Games
